thread.title: Lydia Phillips
thread.title_full: LuxHair Wigs reviewed by Lydia Phillips

author: Lydia Phillips
title: Lydia Phillips
text: I went on a cruise and did not want to limit my water activities, so I saw these advertised 4 weeks before departure date. I wanted different looks so I ordered five. They came in record time. Packed them away. On the ship I was a different woman every night. I enjoyed the compliments and the stares trying to see who I was. I will be ordering more. Love them. Thanks Ms. Shepherd for a wonderful product. Hope I spelled your name right.ðŸ˜„
